classScheduleInformation: Students must register for the lecture and one discussion section.
courseSectionInformation: Same as GLBL 221. Credit is not given for GEOG 221 and GEOG 110.
description: Focuses on contemporary cultural conflicts, competition among nations for economic and mineral resources; treats territorial disputes from a cultural and geographic perspective. Case studies vary to illustrate types of contemporary conflicts. Same as GLBL 221. Credit is not given for GEOG 221 and GEOG 110.
label: Geographies of Global Conflict
